statements: DELETE FROM appraisals WHERE appraisal_id = 100 AND appraised_value < 50000;
DELETE FROM appraisals WHERE appraised_value < 10000 AND appraiser_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM home_assessments WHERE assessment_value > 50000 AND address LIKE '%Avenue%'
DELETE FROM PolicyUnderwriting WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM policy_underwriting WHERE policy_number = 'ABC123' AND appraisal_id = 2;
DELETE FROM policy_underwriting WHERE policy_type = 'home' AND policy_end_date < '2022-01-01';
